title: [急]1.7.2MCP反编译后无法启动！
author: thepio
txt_content:
反编译成功，配置工作空间成功，但是运行的时候报错：
[12:41:14] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[12:41:14] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker

[12:41:14] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM, version 1.7.0_17, running on Windows 8:x86:6.2, installed at D:\JDKANDJAVARUNTIME\JAVA7
[12:41:14] [main/INFO] [FML]: Managed to load a deobfuscated Minecraft name- we are in a deobfuscated environment. Skipping runtime deobfuscation

[12:41:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The minecraft jar file:/C:/Users/ADD/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.2-10.12.2.1121/forgeSrc-1.7.2-10.12.2.1121.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
[12:41:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML has been ordered to ignore the invalid or missing minecraft certificate. This is very likely to cause a problem!
[12:41:15] [main/ERROR] [FML]: Technical information: ClientBrandRetriever was at jar:file:/C:/Users/ADD/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.2-10.12.2.1121/forgeSrc-1.7.2-10.12.2.1121.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class, there were 0 certificates for it

[12:41:15] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Launching wrapped minecraft {net.minecraft.client.main.Main}
[12:41:15] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch

怎么办啊！！！
